text: To make a text underlined means to add a straight line below the text. It is commonly used to emphasize the text. However, it is usually not used. == Usage == Both HTML and Wikitext uses the same way in making _underlined_ text. They both use the `_`and the`_` tags to produce an underlined text.W3Schools tutorial == References == == Related pages == * Bold * Italic Category:Typography
title: Underline
